attributes.title: No
attributes.review: Honestly even though I paid nothing for this app I want a refund for the time wasted while using this app it glitched on me and also very pointless I would rather give no stars to show how angry I am

attributes.review: I downloaded this and it asked for my information and I was like no because they are going to find me and I’m not risking it so if you don’t want trump to know where you live don’t download this app

attributes.title: Sad.
attributes.review: I have downloaded many horrible apps. The worst apps. Apps you wouldn’t even think of. Very sad. This app was the worst. So bad. Terrible. So I said, I’m gonna review this horrible app, so I did, that’s what I’m doing. Cause people got to know. This is a bad app.

attributes.title: So mad😡😡
attributes.review: Literally downloading the app and in the middle of it my phone started to glitch up, next thing I know my phone starts smoking 🙄 only thing good that came out of this was getting my new phone

attributes.title: DONT EVER DONLOWED
attributes.review: When I opens the app my eyes hit with a disgusting photo of a carrot with hair I was shocked and hurts. After cleaning out my eyes the app turned into a horrible racist monster that the was in the White House ruining America. Taking basic humans right away left and right do don’t donlowed EVERRRRRRR!!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app was horrible to download. I kept getting notifications when I turned them off and it kept saying I was “to young” I’m 32..... this app is trash and needs to be taken down NOW!!!!

attributes.title: Trump
attributes.review: This took a long time to download and then when I got it it was just glitchy and buggy. If you can pay the Russians to get you into the Whitehouse then why can’t you pay to get a good app

downloaded this app 3 weeks ago but could only use it since yesterday😔 after 4 minutes and 20 seconds it started sending me links to fanfics about donny💋 it told me about his adventures in fighting an old man with dementia and going down ramps successfully👍 he was sadly killed later in the story by luke skywalkers force ghost 👻 very sad 😞 very tragic 😢 cried my eyes out until i deleted the app. i couldn’t take anymore of this torture ✨🧚❤️💋🔅

attributes.title: FAKE APP
attributes.review: this is a fake app due to fake news and china. that’s all. and idk i keep seeing this frightening mascot that keeps coming up... it’s very aggressive, old, wrinkly, yellow and mostly racist. it’s a horrible figure to see and would frighten anyone using the app

attributes.title: Nope!!!
attributes.review: This app was terrible and everything was so slow it was slow to download and it takes forever to load everything!!!!😡😡
